thread.title: Swiss skiers' alternative games goes viral

title: Swiss skiers' alternative games goes viral
text: February 14, 2018 / 4:02 AM / Updated 13 minutes ago Swiss skiers' alternative games goes viral Reuters Staff 1 Min Read PYEONGCHANG, South Korea (Reuters) - What do you do with your downtime at the Pyeongchang winter games? Ask a Swiss skier. Videos of athletes hanging onto an escalator and using a trolley as a makeshift bobsleigh have gone viral since they were uploaded to the Swiss ski team’s Instagram account. In one video, a team member hangs onto the wrong side of the escalator as it climbs upward. “After 20 years I still couldn’t figure out how these things work! Am I doing it right?”, skier Fabian Bösch said in a caption posted with the video. Reporting by Reuters Television, editing by Darren Schuettler
